alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:45AM EDT until April 15 at 9:31AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski and Bleckley Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, East Juliette, Dames Ferry, West Macon, Macon, Clinchfield, Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25 feet, Minor flooding occurs...with some roads closed with access to residences. RiverView Road closes to residents. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 24.1 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM EDT Tuesday was 26.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 16.9 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.3 feet on 04/25/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
